data.Name: Cradle Of Filth
data.Bio: Cradle of Filth is an English extreme metal band, formed in Suffolk in 1991. The band's musical style evolved originally from black metal to a cleaner and more "produced" amalgam of gothic metal, symphonic metal and other metal genres. Their lyrical themes and imagery are heavily influenced by Gothic literature, poetry, mythology and horror films. They have released 12 full-length studio albums to date. Vocalist Dani Filth is the only remaining founding member. Read more on Last.fm
